attributes.action: take action and leave the EU.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Hiding behind the referendum that eventually saw us join what was then the European Community is not right!  We thought we were joining something that would allow us to trade easier and more effectively within the EU - not that we would be ruled by Europeans in Brussels and elsewhere, not that we would possibly lose our own british Constitution.

Stand up for Britain, its values, traditions, sovereignity and culture - all of which are being destroyed by the EU and the bigwigs in Brussels.
